mapper.select: select s.memnum,s.memsignimg ,s.mempwd, s.memprofile, s.memname, s.memjob,s.memdept,s.memmgr, d.dename, m.memname mgrname, s.memauth,s.meminmail,s.memresign from member s, member m, dept d where s.memmgr = m.memnum and s.memdept = d.denum and s.memnum = #{memnum} and s.mempwd =#{mempwd}
select nvl(memprofile,'1') memprofile from member where memnum=#{memnum} and mempwd=#{mempwd}
mapper.insert: update login set locheck='f',loendate=sysdate where lomem=#{lomem}
mapper.select: select memnum, mempwd, memjob, memname, memmail from member where memnum=#{memnum} and memmail=#{memmail}
mapper.update: update member set mempwd=#{mempwd} where memnum=#{memnum}
